    • Uses of QualityCriterion in org.streaminer.stream.classifier.tree

      Classes in org.streaminer.stream.classifier.tree that implement QualityCriterion 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  QualityCriterion.EntropyCriterion
      The QualityCriterion 'entropy' or 'information (gain)' as used by ID3
      static class  QualityCriterion.GiniCriterion
      The QualityCriterion 'Gini-Index' as used by CART
      Fields in org.streaminer.stream.classifier.tree declared as QualityCriterion 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static QualityCriterion HoeffdingTree.DEFAULT_QUALITY_CRITERION
      defines the default quality criterion: information gain
      static QualityCriterion QualityCriterion.GINI_INDEX 
      static QualityCriterion HoeffdingTree.GINI_INDEX
      use this field to define the quality criterion to be Gini-Index gain
      static QualityCriterion QualityCriterion.INFO_GAIN 
      static QualityCriterion HoeffdingTree.INFORMATION_GAIN
      use this field to define the quality criterion to be information gain
      protected QualityCriterion HoeffdingTree.qualityCriterion
      the chosen QualityCriterion
